abstract: Swiss Re can apparently see the light of the end of the tunnel when it comes to repaying a costly convertible loan from Warren E. Buffett, Reuters reported.
snippet: Swiss Re can apparently see the light of the end of the tunnel when it comes to repaying a costly convertible loan from Warren E. Buffett, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: Swiss Re can apparently see the light of the end of the tunnel when it comes to repaying a costly convertible loan from Warren E. Buffett, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Swiss Re Prepares to Repay Buffett

abstract: It seems that John Paulson and Warren E. Buffet are having a difference of opinion on SunTrust, Bloomberg News reported.
snippet: It seems that John Paulson and Warren E. Buffet are having a difference of opinion on SunTrust, Bloomberg News reported.
lead_paragraph: It seems that John Paulson and Warren E. Buffet are having a difference of opinion on SunTrust.

headline.main: Paulson and Buffett Split on SunTrust
